articles.author: 吴说区块链
articles.description: Re Bittrex 的立场与 Coinbase 一致，认为虽然加密资产的初始销售可能被视为证券，但一旦在二级市场交易，应将其视为商品或其他类型的数字资产。Bittrex 还强调，SEC 在采取行动前没有提供充分的通知。https://cointelegraph.com/news/bittrex-challenges-sec-authority-crypto-lawsuit-seeks-dismissal
articles.title: Re Bittrex 的立场与 Coinbase 一致，认为虽然加密资产的初始销售可能被视为证券，但一旦在二级市场交易，应将其视为商品或其他类型的数字资产。Bittrex 还强调...

articles.author: 吴说区块链
articles.description: 据 Cointelegraph，破产加密交易所 Bittrex 近日提交了一项动议，寻求驳回美国证券交易委员会（SEC）对其提起的诉讼。Bittrex 质疑 SEC 在没有国会明确授权的情况下，对加密货币进行监管的权威。

articles.description:
Re 吴说获悉，Poly Network 发推表示，由于最近的一次攻击，Poly Network 暂时暂停服务。正在积极与相关方接洽，认真评估受影响资产的范围。欢迎网络安全专业人士的协助，以支持解决这个问题。非常感谢用户的理解，将及时通知有关此事件的最新进展。https://twitter.com/polynetwork2/status/1675384703149568001?s=46

Poly Network: Dear users, we would like to inform you that Poly Network is temporarily suspending its services due to a recent attack. We are actively engaging with relevant parties and diligently assessing the extent of the affected assets. 【1/3】

articles.description:
Re 吴说获悉，据 Lookonchain 监测，Poly Network 黑客已出售 940亿枚 SHIB 换取 360 枚ETH，出售 4.95 亿枚 COOK 换取 16 枚 ETH，出售 1500 万枚 RFuel 换取 27 枚ETH。目前，黑客正在将资产和 1 枚 ETH 转移到多个新钱包中，很可能用于出售。https://twitter.com/lookonchain/status/1675354926166454278

Lookonchain: It seems that #PolyNetwork was attacked again, hackers minted a lot of assets.
Hackers have sold 94B $SHIB for 360 $ETH, 495M $COOK for 16 $ETH and 15M $RFuel for 27 $ETH.
And we noticed that hackers are transferring assets and 1 $ETH to new wallets, most likely for sale. https://t.co/a8eqbgy1Vm

Metis 🌿: We are aware of Polybridge’s ongoing situation, and are currently in contact with the PolyNetwork team to minimize the impact of the attack and further asses the situation. 
In regards to the newly minted BNB and BUSD on Metis, there is no sell liquidity available.
All funds on… https://twitter.com/i/web/status/1675347320588718080

宣布融资时个分水岭，不刷，它就快照了
主网上线才是最可怕的，不刷，差距就拉开了
忠诚度计划不好好做，基本就跟空投无缘了
奥德赛活动一定要落实，不然要吃大亏
项目发币了也不能松懈，准备好二次空投
🥲

炒币是会亏钱的，交互撸毛也会 
除了打工和做镰刀割韭菜没什么是永赚的 
不是不亏，迟早会亏 
不是不报，迟早要报 
留点钱好好地活下去比什么都重要 
不是 
好好做面包，面包都会有的 
而是 
好好做面包，面包才会有的  
悲观者正确，乐观者赚钱 
但剩者为王 https://t.co/YYp2wq5DHU

articles.description:
RT Emperor Osmo🧪

articles.description:
Re @hufhaus9 Devil is in the details. If blackrock doesn’t own BTC. But their clients own via blackrock 51% of the network, then a hardfork would make blackrock owner and give them choice 
https://twitter.com/jratcliff/status/1669937251286126592?s=46&t=cM-600GJga7XNxddNsm-Pw

John W. Ratcliff: There is a strange point with the wording in that BlackRock ETF about hard forks.
Traditionally, when a hard fork occurs, users get tokens on *both* forks. Large exchanges have generally honored this for custodial tokens.
However, that's not what the BlackRock ETF says. It says… https://twitter.com/i/web/status/1669937251286126592

articles.author: DeFi Educator
articles.description:
RT Justin Slaughter
So, I respectfully disagree with Noelle on this one. I think BlackRock is doing this on the merits (seeking to get a bitcoin ETF approved) rather than trying to send a political message. 
Bear with me, because this is complicated in terms of Democratic politics. https://twitter.com/NoelleInMadrid/status/1669624250804600832

Noelle Acheson: My take on the BlackRock BTC ETF filing:
- **BIG** news - BlackRock is the world's largest asset manager
- It’s not going to happen
- BlackRock knows this
- Rather, it is sending a political message
- Larry Fink is a prominent Democrat
https://www.coindesk.com/business/2023/06/15/blackrocks-ishares-files-paperwork-for-spot-bitcoin-etf/
